profile_video::clip_card_5::goals[0]: Show the next significant step in the process.

profile_video::text_card_0::text: Be sure to get a variety of compositions when illustrating the process. Some wide shots, close-ups and medium shots. Your character does not have to be in every frame.

profile_video::clip_card_7::goals[0]: If the process has an audience, show their reaction.
